summary: Email correspondence from Sarah Coyne discussing a motion for sentence reduction for an unnamed individual who attempted to cooperate with the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email includes an attachment detailing the individual's assistance and seeks feedback from the recipient.

persons.name: Sarah Coyne
persons.context: Author of the email discussing filing a motion for sentence reduction for an unnamed individual who cooperated with the SDNY investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of the SDNY investigation into his death.

connections.description: Sarah Coyne is filing a motion for sentence reduction on behalf of the unnamed individual.
The unnamed individual attempted to cooperate with the SDNY investigation into Epstein's death.

events.title: Motion Filing Discussion
events.description: Sarah Coyne discusses filing a motion for sentence reduction for an unnamed individual who cooperated with the SDNY investigation into Epstein's death.

keyFacts: An unnamed individual attempted to cooperate with the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Sarah Coyne is filing a motion for sentence reduction for this individual and has discussed it with an EDNY AUSA.
The motion will be filed under seal and includes an attachment detailing the individual's assistance.
